objects.text:
Premium Unisex EDT • Refreshing Aqua Fragrance
100ml/3.4 fl. oz • Long-lasting Scent Profile

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Energizing Aqua Luxury Fragrance
product_details.description:
• ✨ Premium unisex eau de toilette suitable for all gender expressions
• 🌊 Refreshing aqua fragrance in a stunning turquoise bottle design
• ⚡ 100ml/3.4 fl. oz generous size for long-lasting use
• 🎯 Perfect for daily wear with a fresh, contemporary scent profile
• 💫 Luxurious gold-tone cap adds sophisticated touch
• 🌟 Modern, minimalist packaging ideal for gifting
• 💎 Professional-grade EDT formula for lasting fragrance
• ✅ Versatile scent suitable for both casual and formal occasions
• 🔝 Premium BELLAVITA quality at competitive price point

banner_details:
This banner features a premium unisex fragrance product showcased in the center with a prominent image layer (`product_image`). The background is a soft teal gradient (`background`) enriched with translucent golden circles for visual interest. At the top, bold white text layers (`heading`, `subheading`, and `tagline`) introduce the brand and product line with a clean, modern font. Below the product image, supporting descriptive text (`description`) and category info (`product_category`) establish product features. A standout price tag (`price`) in orange draws attention, complemented by a strong call-to-action layer (`cta`) atop a white button (`cta_button_background`), ensuring high visibility.

**Color Palette:**
- Teal Gradient: #00B3B3 to #005F73
- Accent Orange: #EE9B00
- White: #FFFFFF
- Dark Teal (CTA Text): #005F73
- Golden Haze Overlay: #E9D8A6 to #EE9B00
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and visually appealing color palette, ideal for an advertisement banner that radiates freshness and elegance. The primary teal blue (#00B6B3) on the bottle creates an instant feeling of freshness and vitality. This color dominates the image, smoothly blending across the bottle’s surface while subtly shifting in tones to create depth. The golden metallic cap (#D4AF37) contrasts beautifully, adding a touch of luxury and sophistication. The white typography (#FFFFFF) stands out crisply against the teal background, ensuring readability while enhancing the refreshing theme. These colors harmonize well, producing a balanced and striking visual effect.
